8. On March 8, 2019, Mr. Oder and I had follow-up conversations by text message
regarding the Payment Logistics merchant payments. Ex. 10. The next day, I texted my concerns
regarding the accuracy of the LFG accounting of those merchants. Ex. 10. A few weeks later, I
learned that Shift4 was making payments to an alleged Card Connect trading shell company. I
shared that information with Mr. Oder. Mr. Oder advised me that he had not heard of such a
company. See Ex. 10.
